Key Match Events: Amadou Haidara's powerful header rebounded off the post and Edmond Tapsoba inadvertently scored an own goal in the 3rd minute.
Lassine Sinayoko scored a goal for Mali just two minutes into the second half, doubling their lead.
Bertrand Traor√© scored a penalty for Burkina Faso just before the hour mark.
Post-Match Reflections: Mali secured their spot in the quarterfinals with a 2-1 victory over Burkina Faso, setting up a match against hosts Ivory Coast.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Amadou Gon Coulibaly Stadium in Korhogo, Ivory Coast.
The attendance for the match was 19,184.
